short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply press Ctrl + Shift + E to autofill my email address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Otomail, this is the last time I write my email manually!

Tired of manually typing my email address over and over again? Otomail is the perfect solution for me! With Otomail, simply press Ctrl + Shift + E to autofill my email address into my messages.

Say goodbye to the hassle of repetitive typing and the risk of typos.

Imagine the time savings and convenience Otomail can bring. No more worrying about repeatedly entering my email address in every message I send. Otomail does it for me, allowing me to focus on what truly matters.

Download our Chrome plugin now and transform my email experience. With Otomail, simplify my life and boost my productivity every day!
